  • Method Details

    • viewBadges

      @GetMapping("/badges") public String viewBadges(org.springframework.ui.Model model)
      Returns the html for /badges request. Adds list of badges from database to model.
      Parameters:
      model - contains list of badges
      Returns:
      the "badges" html for the request

    • addBadge

      @GetMapping("/badges/add-badge") public String addBadge(org.springframework.ui.Model model)
      Returns the html for /badges/add-badge request. Adds empty BadgeDTO to it to be filled.
      Parameters:
      model - contains an empty BadgeDTO
      Returns:
      the "add-badge" html for the request

    • saveBadge

      @PostMapping("/badges/save-badge") public String saveBadge(@Valid @ModelAttribute("badge") @Valid BadgeDTO badgeDTO, org.springframework.validation.BindingResult bindingResult, org.springframework.ui.Model model)
      Saves the previously empty BadgeDTO.
      Parameters:
      badgeDTO - the previously empty BadgeDTO that will now be saved
      bindingResult - checker in case the binding fails
      model - contains the BadgeDTO
      Returns:
      the "add-badge" html if failed to save, redirects to /badges otherwise

    • removeBadge

      @GetMapping("/badges/remove-badge/{id}") public String removeBadge(@PathVariable Long id, org.springframework.ui.Model model)
      Removes a badge by PathVariable id mentioned in the path.
      Parameters:
      id - taken from the request's path, removes badge with aforementioned id
      model - contains the new and updated list of badges
      Returns:
      redirects to the /badges request
